Posts.EditableText: A synopsis of each link might be helpful. If people just see a wall of links they'll be more lost than they originally were.

Posts.EditableText: I think it was probably just a connection issue, I think Alex and staff do site maintainance~updating~etc around that time, hence the site isn't available for us at that time ~ or spotty~bad connection issues for us trying to get on the site.

Posts.EditableText:
I did remove it, and I thought I had did PM'd you, but I goofed and didn't actually end up sending the PM directly. My apologies! (That definitely was a breach of protocol on my part). I saw no reason to post "resource" links to someone's resume or a commercial product for hard drive repair that has no relation to text adventures.

I'm assuming that this Resources List thread will be used to post resources related to text adventure or generic programming (e.g. JavaScript) that could be applied to text adventures. Otherwise, people could start posting links to recipes, auto mechanics in the greater Manhattan area, how to build an environment friendly planter box, etc, and it would degenerate into chaos. Not to mention being a wide open thread for spammers.

Otherwise, people could start posting links to recipes, auto mechanics in the greater Manhattan area, how to build an environment friendly planter box, etc, and it would degenerate into chaos.
